tags.desc: A list of weighted random entities to populate the SpawnData property, and use one of them as the next spawning operation.
The weight this entity entry has in comparison to the other entries. The chance is (weight / sum of all weights)
The entity data to use when spawning the next wave of mobs
The number of attempts of spawning a mob in each wave
The radius the spawner will try to spawn mobs. The area is squared and 3 block high. Default value is 4.
Ticks until the next spawn wave
Minimum number of ticks to set the 'Delay' property at after each wave
Maximum number of ticks to set the 'Delay' property at after each wave
Maximum number of entities that can be inside the SpawnRange before the spawner stops spawning mobs
The distance a player has to be around the spawner to activate it
The command the command block executes
The last integer output of the executed command
The last output string returned from the command. Saved only if TrackOutput is true.
Whether the command output should be stored in the 'LastOutput' property
